parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application that generates the output stream. You can view the application name on the [Primary/Secondary Stream Mixing](~~606583~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the output stream. You can view the stream name on the [Primary/Secondary Stream Mixing](~~606583~~) page of the ApsaraVideo Live console.
